attributes.action: Prevent job cuts and redundancies at BAE Systems.
attributes.background:
BAE has been a vital part of British engineering and a provider of a huge section of our yearly exports. 

Generations of families, including my own, have give their working lives to it. 

Please don't take it away from the people who have so diligently worked to keep it running!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand you're concerned about job cuts and redundancies at BAE System, but we're not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
